hazel.title: Hazel
hazel.detailed: Hazel is a gorgeous calico cat, born in 2017. She gave me emotional support through college and continues to brighten my every day. She is shy around strangers, but she loves to curl up in a warm lap or play with her sister Pecan.

pecan.title: Pecan
pecan.detailed: Pecan (pronounced pee-can) is a sweet orange girl, born in 2023. She was found outside my parents' Ohio home during the cold January of 2024. Ever since then, she has been completely pampered. Pecan is outgoing and playful, and she loves humans and cats alike.
